name: pump-fun-sdk
description: Pump SDK — Solana token launchpad with bonding curve pricing, AMM migration, tiered fees, creator fee sharing, vanity address generation, and MCP server integration
author: nirholas

skills.name: Pump SDK Core — Instruction Building & On-Chain Interaction
skills.description: Build, extend, and maintain the core Pump SDK — an offline-first TypeScript SDK that constructs Solana TransactionInstructions for token creation, buying, selling, migration, and creator fee collection across three on-chain programs (Pump, PumpAMM, PumpFees).

skills.name: Bonding Curve — Pricing & Quoting Engine
skills.description: Constant-product AMM bonding curve math for token pricing, buy/sell quoting, fee-aware calculations, and market cap computation.

skills.name: Bonding Curve Mathematics — Constant-Product AMM Pricing
skills.description: Deep-dive into the constant-product AMM formula, virtual vs real reserves, fee stripping, ceiling division, and edge case handling for bonding curve operations.

skills.name: Token Lifecycle — Create, Trade, Migrate
skills.description: Full token lifecycle from creation through bonding curve trading, graduation detection, and AMM migration on Solana.

skills.name: Fee Sharing — Creator Fee Distribution
skills.description: Configure and distribute creator fees to multiple shareholders using the PumpFees program with validation and BPS-based share allocation.

skills.name: Fee System — Tiered Fees, Creator Fees & Fee Sharing
skills.description: Complete fee system: tiered protocol fees based on market cap, creator fee collection across two programs, and fee sharing configuration for shareholder distribution.

skills.name: Token Incentives — Volume-Based PUMP Token Rewards
skills.description: Volume-based daily PUMP token reward system with day-indexed epochs, pro-rata distribution, accumulator tracking, and cross-program claiming.

skills.name: Solana Wallet — Key Generation & Security
skills.description: Secure Solana wallet generation using official Solana Labs libraries with Ed25519 keys, memory zeroization, and offline-only operation.

skills.name: Solana Program Architecture — PDAs, Accounts & Multi-Program Coordination
skills.description: Design, derive, and manage Program Derived Addresses (PDAs) and account layouts across the Pump ecosystem's four Solana programs with cross-program invocation patterns.

skills.name: Rust Vanity Generator — High-Performance Address Mining
skills.description: Multi-threaded Rust vanity address generator using rayon and solana-sdk for parallel Base58 pattern matching with prefix/suffix support.

skills.name: Rust Vanity Address Generator — Production-Grade Multi-Threaded Keypair Generation
skills.description: Production-grade Rust binary achieving 100K+ keys/second using Rayon parallel iterators with security-hardened file output and Solana CLI compatibility.

skills.name: TypeScript Vanity Address Generator — Educational Reference Implementation
skills.description: Single-threaded TypeScript vanity address generator using @solana/web3.js with async iteration, event-loop yielding, and streaming generator API.

skills.name: MCP Server — Model Context Protocol for Solana Wallet Operations
skills.description: Model Context Protocol server exposing 7 tools, 3 resource types, and 3 prompts for AI agent consumption over stdio transport with session keypair management.

skills.name: Shell Scripting & CLI Tools — Production Bash Scripts
skills.description: Production-quality Bash scripts for vanity generation, keypair verification, batch operations, dependency auditing, and test orchestration with security-hardened patterns.

skills.name: Security Practices — Cryptographic Safety, Memory Zeroization & Hardened I/O
skills.description: Defense-in-depth security across Rust, TypeScript, and Bash: key handling, memory zeroization, secure file I/O, input validation, privilege management, and dependency auditing.

skills.name: OpenClaw — AI Agent Skill Packaging & Discovery
skills.description: Design, package, and deploy OpenClaw-compatible skill packages for AI agent discovery, MCP runtime integration, SperaxOS agent teams, and plug-and-play deployment across Claude, Copilot, and other LLM agents.

skills.name: OpenClaw Wallet Operations — Keypair Generation, Signing & Validation
skills.description: Generate Solana Ed25519 keypairs, sign and verify messages, validate addresses, and manage session-based key storage through MCP tools using official Solana Labs cryptographic libraries.

skills.name: OpenClaw Token Creation — Mint New Tokens on Pumpfun
skills.description: Create new tokens on the Pumpfun protocol using createV2Instruction with Token-2022, optional mayhem mode, initial buy bundling, and metadata URI configuration.

skills.name: OpenClaw Token Trading — Buy & Sell on Bonding Curves
skills.description: Buy and sell tokens on Pumpfun bonding curves with slippage protection, fee-aware quoting, and automatic ATA creation for both Token and Token-2022 programs.

skills.name: OpenClaw Fee Management — Creator Fee Collection & Distribution
skills.description: Collect accumulated creator fees, configure fee sharing among shareholders, and distribute earnings proportionally across Pump and PumpAMM programs.

skills.name: OpenClaw Vanity Address — Custom Solana Address Generation
skills.description: Generate Solana keypairs with custom Base58 prefix and suffix patterns using MCP tools, with Rust high-performance and TypeScript reference implementations.

skills.name: OpenClaw Market Data — Bonding Curve Quoting & Analytics
skills.description: Query bonding curve state, compute fee-aware buy/sell quotes, calculate market cap, detect graduation status, and read token incentive accumulators for informed trading decisions.
